description: While on a long hike, Chad Hunt finds Dominik Rider hooded, naked, bound, and helpless. Fate has handed Chad a strange situation, and he's smart enough to take advantage of it. Chad pulls out his famously humongous cock and feeds it to the helpless Dominik. Chad whips his victim into submission with his belt, then fucks the tied-up Dominik as if the man were a pinata and his heavy cock was a baseball bat.
title: The Hiker
